Detailed Description

Fetches and holds the search headings from ExtServiceModule.

Thread safe.

bool SearchHeadingManager::shouldUpdateSearchHeadings (  uint32  headingCRC  )  const
 

Whether search headings should be updated, either if crc mismatch or update time for headings was reached.

Parameters:
headingCRC A checksum to test whether the headings are the same.
Returns:
True if headings needs to be updated.
